tool_description: Greyhound Racing API - UK. In realtime! Daily races, race detail, historical data and more.
name: Greyhound Racing UK
title: Greyhound Racing UK

api_list.name: Racecards
api_list.description:
**Get races list.**

- By default current day.
- Or by date, setting it by parameter

api_list.name: Race detail info
api_list.description:
**Get race detailed info by ID {id_race}.**

You can get the "id_race" from Results or Racecards endpoints
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://greyhound-racing-uk.p.rapidapi.com/race/53128"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "greyhound-racing-uk.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://greyhound-racing-uk.p.rapidapi.com/race/{id_race}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "greyhound-racing-uk.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Results
